thread.title: Jose Mourinho basically confirms HUGE injury blow for Man United (Video)
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho basically confirms HUGE injury blow for Man United (Video)

author: Rebecca Knight
title: Jose Mourinho basically confirms HUGE injury blow for Man United (Video)
text:
Jose Mourinho basically confirms HUGE injury blow for Man United (Video) By Rebecca Knight   A huge blow 
Manchester United were handed a double injury blow ahead of their first major final of the season, with the EFL Cup this weekend. 
The club had their second leg in the Europa League, with Jose Mourinho deciding to play all his big guns – and seeing a win, but one that slightly backfired. 
It looked almost certain that Mkhitaryan would miss the final with hamstring trouble, but more worryingly for United, Carrick was also off with injury and basically ruled out of the game by his manager during the post match interview. 
Mourinho was speaking to BT Sport after the win, and said: “I do not know, I say what I feel. 
It is a calf and a hamstring. Three days is no time” A chance for others 
Mourinho followed it up by saying that would then mean there would be a chance for other players to get into the line up, with the likes of Fellaini and Bastian Schweinsteiger both now in contention for the game.
